input.sentences: we all decided to go and watch the fireworks show at the park .
there were a lot of fireworks and lots of colors .
some were n't as big or bright as others .
everyone had a good time watching them .
this was one of our favorites . it lit up the entire sky !
output.sentences: I hope this is a good spot for tonight.
It's a good spot the fireworks are staring.
Man I hope the fireworks dont stop.
When will it end, my ears hurt?
